changes.summary: Fixed final 3 TypeScript build errors: EmailDashboard tier enum mismatch, FinancialDashboard unused imports, JarvisChat SpeechRecognition runtime value usage
changes.test_results: Not run (type fixes only, build verified with tsc --noEmit)

decisions_made: Updated EmailDashboard to use new 7-tier EmailTier system (reply_urgent, to_review, social, offers, newsletters, low_priority, unsubscribe)
Removed unused Check, ArrowUpDown, and categorizeTransaction imports from FinancialDashboard
Fixed JarvisChat SpeechRecognition by creating runtime shim instead of type-only declaration â€” SpeechRecognition is a browser-provided constructor value, not just a type

continuation.next_immediate_step: Run test suite (npm test) to verify no regressions from type fixes
